subject: Golf
John Deere Classic (Golf)
Scottish Open (Golf)
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Steve Stricker shot a nine-under 62 to take a six-stroke lead in the John Deere Classic, breaking the PGA Tour’s 54-hole scoring record.
snippet: Steve Stricker shot a nine-under 62 to take a six-stroke lead in the John Deere Classic, breaking the PGA Tour’s 54-hole scoring record.
